page.title: 06SW BASINGSTOKE: LAW/ORDER 1
page.content: The area is policed in two ways. First, by police panda cars patrolling the area. These operate from police headquarters in Basingstoke to the north of the M3 and from Preston Candover to the south. Second, the area is policed to the north by a {Community Policeman,}who operates on foot or on a bicycle on a regular beat for 8 hours per day, and to the south by a{Rural Policeman. Both the Community Policeman and the Rural Policeman operate very much from home, where they may be involved in paperwork for some 2 hours per day. They are responsible for issuing such items as shotgun and pedlars licences. They both maintain regular contacts with respective H.Q.
